system.description: Effect: The user sacrifices HP equal to 1/2 of their Max HP then attacks with this move. If the user's current HP is less than or equal to 1/2 of their Max HP, this attack fails.

actions.name: Steel Beam
actions.description: Effect: The user sacrifices HP equal to 1/2 of their Max HP then attacks with this move. If the user's current HP is less than or equal to 1/2 of their Max HP, this attack fails.
